fields.question_text: Do you recycle at least once daily?
fields.question_info: Regular recycling not only reduces your footprint, it also reduces the the amount of waste in our landfills

fields.question_text: Do you avoid driving to school/work by driving when possible?
fields.question_info: Using your bike, a scooter, or even just plain old carpooling is a great alternative to make your daily commute less harmful to the environment!

fields.question_text: Do you eat vegan at least twice a week?
fields.question_info: The vegan diet - one that is based wholly on consuming non-animal based products - has been shown to work wonders on our environment.

fields.question_text: Do you travel on planes more than once a year?
fields.question_info: Paying down your carbon offsets from air travel is one of the most powerful ways to reduce your carbon footprint.

fields.question_text: Does your home currently use solar panels for electricity?
fields.question_info: Solar energy is at least 20X better than the environment than coal!
